name: Chicken, Charred Tomato & Broccoli Salad

name: Grilled Pizza with Pesto, Tomatoes & Feta

name: Tuna Tea Sandwiches

name: Honey-Mustard Chicken Sandwiches

name: Spiced Avocado Sandwich

name: Avocado & Black Bean Tortas
ingredients: 1 cup shredded cabbage (thinly)//1 tomato (ripe, seeded and chopped)//2 radishes (large, thinly sliced)//1 tbsp fresh lime juice//1 tsp hot pepper sauce//2 crusty sandwich rolls (split)//2/3 cup black beans (low-sodium refried, warmed or at room temperature)//1/4 cup queso fresco (crumbled, or cotija cheese)//1 avocado (small ripe, pitted, peeled and sliced)

name: Vegetarian Split Pea Soup

name: Zucchini-Basil Soup

name: Roasted Cauliflower Soup
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower//4 tbsps olive oil//1 tsp sea salt (celtic)//1 onion (large, diced)//4 cups water (or stock)

name: Tuscan Chickpea Soup

name: Chunky Celery Soup

name: Miso Soup

name: Cashew Tomato Soup

name: Curried Lentil Soup

name: Yellow Split Pea Soup

name: Lentil Soup with Lemon

name: Fire Roasted Spicy Tomato Soup

name: Detox Green Machine Soup
ingredients: 1 lb green beans//8 celery (sticks)//4 lbs zucchini//2 bunches spinach//1 yellow onion//5 cloves garlic//1 bunch basil//1 bunch parsley

name: Indian Spiced Carrot Soup with Ginger

name: Harvest Sweet Potato Soup

name: Couscous with Apricots

name: Seekh Kebabs
ingredients: 1 cup cilantro (finely chopped)//3 tbsps garam masala//1 serrano chile (seeded and minced)//2 cloves garlic (minced)//1 ginger root (peeled and finely minced)//1/2 tsp salt//1 lime//2 cups plain greek yogurt//1/2 cup red onion (minced)//1/2 tsp salt//1/2 tsp ground black pepper (freshly)//1 lb ground lamb//1 cup mint (finely chopped)

name: Chicken Teriyaki
ingredients: 8 ozs crushed pineapple//3 tbsps low sodium soy sauce//2 tbsps agave nectar (or honey)//1 tsp fresh ginger (grated)//1 garlic cloves (small, finely minced)//4 boneless skinless chicken breasts (about 2 pounds)

name: New Potato Rendang & Green Beans
ingredients: 1 chilies (large red Fresno, seeded)//1/4 cup shallots (minced)//1 tbsp ginger (peeled and minced)//2 cloves garlic (peeled)//1 lemon (zested)//1 lime (zested)//1 tsp ground turmeric//1/8 tsp clove (ground)//1 cup coconut milk//1 lb fingerling potatoes (halved)//4 ozs green beans (trimmed)//1 carrots (medium, julienned)//1 tsp tamari (or soy sauce)//1/2 tsp salt

name: Ginger Salmon
ingredients: 2 tsps olive oil//1 tbsp honey//1 tbsp dijon mustard//2 tsps fresh ginger (grated)//1 lb salmon fillets

name: Roasted Eggplant with Ricotta and Mint
ingredients: 2 tbsps olive oil//11/2 lbs eggplant (about 2 medium, in 3/4- to 1-inch slices)//2 ozs ricotta salata (chopped or crumbled)//2 tbsps capers (drained)//1/3 cup red onion (finely diced)//3 tomatoes (seeded, diced medium, 1 1/2 cups)//3 tbsps mint leaves (minced fresh)//2 tsps red wine vinegar//ground black pepper (Freshly)

name: Grilled Eggplant
ingredients: 2 eggplant (sliced lengthwise)//3 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//salt (taste)//pepper (taste)//1 tbsp capers//1 tbsp fresh lemon juice//1/4 cup flat leaf parsley (chopped fresh)

name: Eggplant Caviar
ingredients: 2 eggplant (medium)//1 tbsp olive oil (plus additional for preparing the pan)//2 tbsps fresh lemon juice//1 clove garlic (or shallot, peeled and minced, or both)//1/2 tsp sea salt (or smoked)//1/8 tsp chili pepper (powder)//2 tbsps chopped fresh mint (parsley, cilantro, or basil)

name: Pickled Eggplant
ingredients: 2 eggplant (medium-sized, nice, bright)//2 cups vinegar (organic apple)//2 garlic (plump cloves of)//3 tbsps olive oil (extra virgin, nice and fruity)//2 tbsps parsley (minced)

name: Roasted Eggplants with Herbs
ingredients: 4 eggplant (13 ounces)//21/2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil (divided)//1/4 tsp fine sea salt//1/8 tsp black pepper (freshly ground)//1/3 cup fresh basil (chopped)//2 tsps sage (chopped fresh)//2 tsps fresh rosemary (chopped)

name: Best Basic Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 6 red bell pepper//3 tbsps olive oil (plus more for brushing)//1 red onion (chopped)//2 yukon gold potatoes (peeled and cut into 1/4-inch cubes)//1 eggplant (cut into 1/2-inch cubes)//2 jalapeno chilies (seeds and ribs removed, roughly chopped)//1 cup tomato sauce//1 tbsp fresh oregano (or marjoram, chopped)//1 large eggs//2 tbsps ricotta cheese//1/2 cup parmesan cheese (grated)

name: Spaghetti Squash with Tomatoes and Basil
ingredients: 1 spaghetti squash//1 tbsp olive oil//4 cloves garlic (minced)//2 tomatoes (chopped)//3 basil leaves (chopped)//salt (and pepper)//1 tsp balsamic vinegar//1/4 cup pecorino cheese (grated)

name: Smothered Yellow Squash with Basil

name: Grilled Summer Squash
ingredients: 2 cups zucchini (baby, halved lengthwise)//2 cups yellow squash (baby, quartered lengthwise)//2 tbsps olive oil//1/2 tsp kosher salt//1/2 tsp black pepper//cooking spray

name: Warm Delicata Squash Salad with Balsamic-Oregano Drizzle
ingredients: 2 tbsps olive oil//4 lbs delicata squash//2 red onion (medium, halved and cut into thin half moons)//1 tbsp balsamic vinegar//1 tsp fresh oregano (finely chopped)//1/4 tsp crushed red pepper flakes//1 tbsp olive oil

name: Farro with Kalamata Olives
ingredients: 2 tbsps olive oil//1/2 red onion (chopped)//3 garlic cloves (thinly sliced)//11/2 cups farro//1 bay leaf//4 cups water//1 tbsp preserved lemon (chopped)//1/4 cup tomatoes (diced)//2 tbsps chives (chopped)//2 tbsps basil (fresh)//1/4 cup kalamata (pitted and chopped)//1 tsp salt//1 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil//1/4 cup chickpeas (canned, rinsed and drained)

name: Cheese and Olive-Stuffed Tomatoes
ingredients: 4 tomatoes (ripe, 2 14 pounds)//1/2 cup feta cheese (crumbled)//1/4 cup kalamata (chopped pitted)//2 tbsps flat leaf parsley (chopped fresh)//2 tbsps fresh basil (chopped)

name: Fennel, Artichoke and Potato Tagine
ingredients: 3 tbsps avocado oil//2 red onion (cut into eighths)//2 cloves garlic (coarsely chopped)//1 slice candied ginger (finely chopped)//1 tbsp spices (Middle Eastern or Moroccan, blend)//1 sweet potatoes (large, cut into lengthwise into wedges)//2 cups fennel bulb (diced)//14 ozs artichoke hearts (drained and cut in half)//1 cup feta cheese (crumbled or finely diced)//1/2 cup sesame seeds (toasted or plain)

name: Sauteed Artichokes

name: Artichokes Braised in Lemon and Olive Oil
ingredients: 1 lemon (halved)//8 artichokes (medium)//3 shallots (small, sliced into thin rings)//1 carrots (finely chopped)//3 garlic cloves (thinly sliced)//1/4 tsp fennel seeds//1/4 tsp coriander seeds//1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil (divided)//11/2 cups water//3 strips lemon zest//1/4 cup fresh lemon juice (divided)//2 tbsps flat leaf parsley (coarsely chopped)

name: Artichoke Hummus
ingredients: 15 ozs garbanzo beans (chickpeas, drained and rinsed)//6 ozs marinated artichoke hearts (drained and rinsed)//1 clove garlic (peeled and chopped or pressed)//2 tbsps tahini (sesame seed paste)//1/2 lemon (or more, to taste)//2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//1/4 cup water//1/2 tsp kosher salt (or to taste)//squirt (small, Sriracha, optional)

name: Grilled Garlic Artichokes
ingredients: 2 artichokes//1 lemon (quartered)//3/4 cup olive oil//4 cloves chopped garlic//1 tsp salt//1/2 tsp black pepper (ground)

name: Hot Spinach and Artichoke Salad
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil//10 ozs spinach (rinsed, stemmed, and dried)//1 red onion (thinly sliced)//8 ozs marinated artichoke hearts//1 cup feta cheese crumbles

name: Braised Artichokes and Fava Beans
ingredients: 9 artichoke hearts (diced)//4 cloves garlic (peeled and minced)//1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil//1/4 cup fresh lemon juice//1 tbsp sugar//salt//2 lbs fresh fava bean (shelled)//1 tbsp finely chopped fresh parsley

name: Tomato and Artichoke Heart Salad
ingredients: 31/2 tomatoes (ripe, I used 1 great big one)//1 can artichoke hearts (not marinated)//1/2 cup oil//1/8 cup white wine vinegar//1 clove garlic (pressed or minced)//11/2 tbsps herbs (fresh, like basil or tarrogon or 1/2 tsp. dried herbs)//pepper//salt

name: Salad with Artichokes
ingredients: 4 cups mix salad green//1/2 red onion (sliced)//14 ozs artichoke hearts (water drained)//1/2 cup vegetable oil//1/2 cup red wine vinegar//1 tsp seasoning salt//1 tsp black pepper (ground)//1 tsp garlic powder//3 tbsps grated parmesan cheese

name: Pinon Rice Bake Recipe with Artichokes, Plum Tomatoes, Pine nuts and Goat Cheese
ingredients: 21/2 cups long-grain brown rice (cooked, I cook mine with saffron)//1/2 cup nuts (toasted pinon, aka pine nuts)//3 plum tomatoes (ripe, seeded, chopped)//12 artichoke hearts (halved, I used Trader Joe's frozen, thawed)//4 ozs green chile//jalapeno chilies//1 cup corn kernels (roasted)//3 cloves garlic (peeled, chopped)//seasoning (to taste, I used cumin, Old Bay Seasoning, sea salt and ground pepper)//extra-virgin olive oil (as needed, about 4-5 tablespoons)//4 ozs goat cheese (or sheep feta, cubed)

name: Spinach Artichoke Hummus with Roasted Red Peppers

name: Teriyaki Pork and Vegetables with Noodles

name: Roasted Eggplant with Artichoke Hearts and Salsa Verde

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts

name: Shredded and Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Almonds and Parmesan

name: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Sweet Chili Sauce
ingredients: 1 lb brussels sprouts (stem trimmed and halved)//2 tbsps cooking oil//2 garlic cloves (finely minced)//2 tsps fish sauce (or soy sauce)//2 tbsps sweet chili sauce

name: Maple Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Apples and Cranberries

name: Green Smoothie with Spinach, Pear, and Ginger

name: Oranges, Caramelized Red Onions and Baby Spinach in Balsamic Vinagrette

name: Spinach Salad with Beets and Walnuts

name: Chicken, Navy Bean, and Spinach Stew
ingredients: 3 tbsps olive oil (more if needed)//3/4 lb boneless skinless chicken breasts (pounded to 1/2-inch thickness, or, if you’re rushed and rich, just buy skinny chicken cutlets)//ground black pepper//coarse salt//1 onion (medium, roughly chopped)//3 yukon gold potatoes (medium, about 12 ounces scrubbed and cut into 1/2-inch dice)//1 garlic cloves (small, minced)//1 lb button mushrooms (trimmed, caps sliced 1/2 inch thick)//1/2 tsp dried thyme//1/2 tsp dried rosemary//1 tbsp tomato paste//3 cups cold water//10 ozs baby spinach (fresh)//151/2 ozs navy beans (drained and rinsed)//1 tbsp red wine vinegar//1 tbsp demi glac (chicken, optional–well, not if you want a kickass stew)

name: Ginger-Blueberry Sorbet
ingredients: 4 cups blueberries (about 1 1/4 pounds), fresh or frozen (see Tips)//3/4 cup water//2 tablespoons lemon juice//1/2 teaspoon minced fresh ginger//1/4 cup sugar////

name: Guacamole-Stuffed Poblano Peppers

name: Bulgur Salad with Romesco Sauce

name: Roasted Garlic & Asparagus Salad
ingredients: 2 heads garlic//3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided//1/2 teaspoon salt, divided//1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, divided//1/4 cup minced fresh chives//2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh garlic scapes or 2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic cloves//1/4 cup lemon juice//2 bunches asparagus, trimmed//2 teaspoons freshly grated lemon zest//1/2 cup walnut halves, toasted and chopped (see Tip)////

name: Spiced Pistachios
ingredients: 2 tablespoons orange juice//2 tablespoons Chinese five-spice powder//1 1/4 teaspoons kosher salt//2 cups unsalted pistachios////

name: Snap Pea & Quinoa Salad
ingredients: 2 cups water//1 cup quinoa//2 cups fresh snap peas, trimmed and cut diagonally into thirds//1 1/2 cups button mushrooms, cut into quarters or eighths if large//1/3 cup thinly sliced red onion, cut into 1-inch lengths//1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill//1/3 cup white balsamic vinegar or white-wine vinegar//1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil or flaxseed oil//1 teaspoon freshly grated lemon zest//1 tablespoon lemon juice//1 teaspoon pure maple syrup////

name: Moroccan Lentil Soup

name: Quinoa Salad with Oranges, Beets & Pomegranate

name: Roasted Turnips & Butternut Squash with Five-Spice Glaze
ingredients: 4 medium turnips (about 1 1/2 pounds), peeled//1 small butternut squash, peeled and seeded//2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil//1/2 teaspoon salt//1/4 teaspoon freshly ground pepper//1 small red onion, halved and sliced//2 tablespoons molasses//1 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder (see Tip)////

name: Butternut Squash & Tomato Posole
ingredients: 1 28-ounce can whole peeled tomatoes, preferably no-salt added//1 tablespoon canola oil//2 cups chopped red onion//4 cloves garlic, minced//2 tablespoons chili powder//3 cups diced (1/2-inch) peeled butternut squash (see Tip)//1 1/2 cups vegetable broth//1 15-ounce can white hominy, rinsed//1 15-ounce can pinto beans, rinsed//1 ripe but firm avocado, diced//1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro////

name: Chipotle-Orange Broccoli & Tofu
ingredients: 1 14-ounce package extra-firm water-packed tofu//1/2 teaspoon salt, divided//3 tablespoons canola oil, divided//6 cups broccoli florets//1 cup orange juice//1 tablespoon minced chipotle in adobo (see Tip), seeded if desired//1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro////

name: Rice Noodle & Edamame Salad
ingredients: 1 10- to 12-ounce package frozen shelled edamame//8 ounces thin rice noodles or rice sticks (see Tip)//1 cup arame or dulse seaweed//3/4 cup rice vinegar//2 tablespoons canola oil//2 tablespoons sugar//1/2 teaspoon salt//1 cup shredded carrot//1 medium red bell pepper, thinly sliced//1/3 cup thinly sliced red onion//1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro//1/2 cup lightly salted peanuts, chopped, divided////

name: Brown Rice Pilaf
ingredients: 2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil//2/3 cup long-grain brown rice//1 1/3 cups water//1/4 cup currants//1/4 cup slivered or sliced almonds, toasted (see Tips)////

name: Ribollita Soup
ingredients: 1 14-ounce can whole peeled plum tomatoes//2 15-ounce cans cannellini beans, rinsed, divided//3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided//1 medium leek, halved lengthwise and sliced (see Tip), white and light green parts only//1/4 cup thinly sliced garlic//1/2 teaspoon freshly ground pepper, divided//1 cup diced carrots//1 cup diced celery//1 cup diced zucchini//1/4 teaspoon salt, divided//1 bunch kale or Swiss chard, trimmed and cut into 2-inch-wide slices//1/4 head Savoy or green cabbage, cut into 1-inch cubes//2 cups diced russet potatoes//3 cups vegetable broth//2 cups water//1/2 teaspoon dried thyme//1 bay leaf//1/8 teaspoon celery seed//Crushed red pepper to taste////

name: Curried Red Lentil Kohlrabi, and Couscous Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup white wine vinegar//11/2 tbsps curry powder (sweet)//2 garlic cloves (pressed)//2/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil//16 ozs red lentils (about 2 1/4 cups)//3 kohlrabi (large, about 1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds; leaves stemmed, thinly sliced; bulb peeled, cut into 1/3-inch dice, about 3 cups)//1 cup couscous (plain, about 6 ounces)//1 cup green onions (chopped)//6 ozs baby spinach (package)//1/2 cup chopped fresh mint

name: Coconut Tapioca in Papaya Bowl
ingredients: 3/4 cup tapioca pearls//14 ozs coconut milk//2 papaya (large, halved lengthwise and seeded)

name: Halo Halo
ingredients: 1/4 cup small pearl tapioca//1 cup berries//crushed ice//1/4 cup condensed milk//1/2 cup coconut milk

name: Strawberry Tapioca
ingredients: 1/2 cup strawberries (fresh, hulled and halved)//11/2 cups water//1/4 cup quick-cooking tapioca

name: Bulgur, Garbanzo Bean, and Cucumber Salad
ingredients: 2 cups bulgur (whole grain quick-cooking, 11 to 12 ounces)//16 ozs garbanzo beans (cans, chickpeas, drained)//21/2 pts cherry tomatoes (containers small red and/or yellow)//1 cup hothouse cucumber (diced unpeeled English)//1 cup roasted red peppers (diced, from jar)//2/3 cup fresh dill (packed chopped)//1/4 cup balsamic vinegar (white)//1 tbsp ground cumin//6 tbsps olive oil

name: Balsamic-Glazed Roasted Beets
ingredients: 6 beetroots (medium, 2 bunches, or about 3-1/2 pounds)//1 tsp kosher salt//2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//1/3 cup balsamic vinegar (inexpensive)//1 tbsp maple syrup//black pepper (freshly ground, to taste)

name: Beet Salad
ingredients: 12 red beets (small, about 1 1/2 pounds, stems and roots trimmed)//2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//freshly ground pepper//coarse salt//11/2 tbsps red wine vinegar//1/2 bunch fresh chives (snipped into 1/2-inch pieces, about 1/4 cup)

name: Golden Beet Slaw
ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil//2 tbsps red wine vinegar//1 tsp orange zest//1 tbsp orange juice//3/4 tsp coarse salt//1/4 tsp freshly ground pepper//11/2 lbs golden beets (peeled and cut into matchsticks)//3 scallions (sliced)//1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro

name: Roasted Beet and Carrot Salad
ingredients: 2 lbs red beets (scrubbed, peeled, and thinly sliced)//6 carrots (peeled and thinly sliced)//3 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//freshly ground pepper//coarse salt//3 tbsps orange juice//11/2 tsps sherry vinegar//11/2 tsps tarragon (chopped, leaves)//3 Belgian endive (small, trimmed, halved lengthwise, and cut into 1-inch pieces)//4 ozs fresh goat cheese (crumbled, about 1 cup)//1/3 cup toasted pecans (chopped)

name: Salade Nicoise
ingredients: 1 shallots (large, minced)//1 tbsp capers//2 tbsps dijon mustard//2 tbsps white wine vinegar//1 tsp coarse salt//1/4 tsp freshly ground pepper//6 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//1/2 lb green beans//1 lb small red potato//2 large eggs//1 head romaine lettuce (cut into bite-size pieces)//1 stalk celery (cut into1/4-inch slices)//2 tomatoes (cut into wedges)//4 radishes (thinly sliced)//7 ozs water (packed solid white tuna, drained)//3 ozs olives (Nicoise or other, about 24)//8 anchovies (optional)

name: White Bean Salad
ingredients: 1 cup small white bean (dried, cannellini or great northern or)//1 cloves garlic//1 bay leaf//1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil//1/2 tsp grated lemon zest//1 tbsp lemon juice//1/2 tsp honey//1 tbsp shallots (chopped)//1 cup snow peas (sugar snap)//1/2 bunch chopped fresh chives//5 radishes (mild, lady slipper, thinly sliced)//3 tbsps fresh basil (chopped)

name: Roasted Beets with Citrus, Feta and Walnuts

name: Quinoa with Corn, Tomatoes, Avocado, and Lime
ingredients: 2 tbsps olive oil (divided)//1/2 cup yellow onion (chopped, from one small onion)//1 cup quinoa (pre-washed, if not pre-washed, follow package instructions for rinsing)//12/3 cups low sodium vegetable broth (recommended brand: Swanson Organic)//1 tsp salt (divided)//1 cup chopped tomatoes (from 2 medium tomatoes)//11/4 cups corn (fresh cut cooked, from 2 cobs)//2 scallions (white and green parts, finely sliced)//1 jalapeno chilies (small, seeded and finely chopped)//1/3 cup chopped fresh cilantro//2 tbsps lime juice (from 1 large lime)//1 avocado (cut into bite-sized chunks)

name: Beet Hummus
ingredients: 1/2 lb beetroots (about 4 medium sized beets, scrubbed clean, cooked, peeled, and cubed*)//2 tbsps sesame seed paste (tahini)//5 tbsps lemon juice//1 clove garlic (chopped)//1 tbsp ground cumin//1 tbsp lemon zest (zest from approx. 2 lemons)//1 pinch sea salt (or Kosher salt)//ground pepper (Fresh, to taste)

name: Barley and Corn Salad with Arugula and Haricot Vert
ingredients: 1/3 cup pearl barley//1/2 lb haricots verts (slim green beans trimmed and cut into 2″ segments)//1 ear corn//1 bunch arugula (about 4 ounces total)//1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil//1/8 cup white wine vinegar//2 tbsps shallots (minced)//1 tbsp fresh thyme (minced)//1 tsp dijon mustard//4 tbsps soft fresh goat cheese (such as Montrachet, crumbled)

name: Quinoa Salad with Black Beans, Corn, and Tomatoes
ingredients: 1 cup quinoa (uncooked, well rinsed)//1/2 tsp salt//2 cups water//1/3 cup purple onion (diced)//2 tbsps lime juice//15 ozs black beans (drained and rinsed)//1 cup frozen corn (defrosted, OR 1 cup of fresh corn, parboiled, drained and cooled, approximately the amount of kernels from one ear of corn)//3 tomatoes (medium, seeded and cut into chunks)//5 ozs queso fresco (Queso Panela, fresh Mozzarella or other mild farmer's cheese, cut into 1/4-inch to 1/2-inch cubes)//1 jalapeno chilies (seeded and finely chopped)//1/4 cup chopped cilantro (including tender stems, packed)//3 tbsps olive oil

name: Sea Bass with Warm Vegetable Salad
ingredients: 2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil (plus more for drizzling)//25 ozs sea bass fillets//freshly ground pepper//fine sea salt//pepper sauce (Roasted)//salad (Warm Vegetable)

name: Vegan Macaroni and Cheese
ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil//2 yellow onion (medium, small dice)//1/2 head broccoli (about 12 ounces, stems trimmed to 1/2 inch and cut into 1-inch florets)//1/2 head cauliflower (about 10 ounces, stems trimmed to 1/2 inch and cut into 1-inch florets)//2 garlic cloves (medium, minced)//1 tbsp kosher salt (plus more as needed)//1 tsp ground black pepper (freshly, plus more as needed)//1 lb elbow macaroni//14 ozs unsweetened coconut milk//1/3 cup toasted walnuts (whole)//2 tbsps all-purpose flour//1 tsp dijon mustard//1 tsp paprika//3/4 tsp cayenne pepper//3/4 cup nutritional yeast//21/2 cups unsweetened soymilk

name: Vegan Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 1 lb pasta (vegan, or regular if you prefer!)//11/4 cups water//1 cup almonds (plain, Breeze, may use other non-dairy milk)//3/4 cup nutritional yeast//3 tbsps potato starch (or cornstarch)//1 tbsp lemon juice//1 tsp salt (or more to taste)//1/2 tsp garlic puree//1/2 tsp dry mustard//1/2 tsp paprika//1/2 tsp tumeric (curry powder)//1 tbsp tahini//black pepper (to taste)

name: Okra Curry
ingredients: 1 lb okra (ends trimmed, cut into 1/4-inch rounds)//1 tbsp olive oil//1 tsp cumin seed (whole)//1/2 tsp curry powder//1/2 tsp chickpea flour//1/2 tsp salt

name: Curried Egg Salad
ingredients: 5 eggs (good quality)//11/2 tsps curry powder (your favorite)//3 tbsps plain yogurt//1 pinch salt//1/2 onion (small, chopped)//1/2 apples (medium, chopped)//1/4 cup pecans (toasted and chopped)//1 bunch chives (minced)

name: Easy Chickpea Curry

name: Lamb Curry with Cauliflower and Double Cilantro
ingredients: 2 tbsps vegetable oil (or olive oil)//3/4 cup onion (cut into slivers)//11/2 lbs lamb (fat trimmed and cut into 3/4 inch cubes)//1 tsp garlic puree//1 tsp ginger (puree)//1 can diced tomatoes (I like Muir Glen Organic Tomatoes)//1/2 cup water//3/4 tsp agave nectar (or 1 tsp. sugar)//2 tsps cilantro (dried, or use heaping T chopped fresh cilantro)//4 tbsps curry paste (Patak's Madras, or less if you don't like spicy food, use any brand of hot curry paste or powder that you have)//salt (to taste)//2 cups cauliflower (cut into small flowerets)//1 cup light coconut milk (original recipe used dessicated coconut)//1/2 cup chopped cilantro

name: Curried Lamb Shanks

name: Chicken Curry

name: Artichoke Tomato Salad
ingredients: 5 tomatoes (large, about 2 pounds, cut into wedges)//1/4 tsp salt//1/4 tsp pepper//71/2 ozs artichoke hearts (marinated quartered, drained)//21/4 ozs ripe olives (sliced, drained)//2 tbsps fresh parsley (minced)//2 tbsps white wine vinegar//2 garlic cloves (minced)

name: Artichoke Tossed Salad (Italian salad dressing)

name: Restaurant-Style Mexican Rice

name: Mexican Slaw
ingredients: 2 lime//3 tbsps vegetable oil//1 head cabbage//6 ozs radishes//1 oz fresh cilantro//pepper//salt

name: Mexican Green Bean Salad

name: Mexican Quinoa

name: Giant Black Bean Salad

name: Black Quinoa Chopped Salad
ingredients: 1 cup black quinoa (cooked and cooled, or white, or red — whatever you prefer. I like this recipe.)//1/2 cup seedless cucumber (chopped)//2 celery ribs (chopped)//1 yellow bell pepper (chopped)//1 jalapeno chilies (seeds and ribs removed, chopped)//1 granny smith apples (cored and chopped)//1 cup grapes (red or black, halved)//1/2 cup almonds (marcona)//1/4 cup basil (chopped)//1/4 cup mint (chopped)//1 garlic cloves (finely grated, or 1/2 clove, minced)//1 lemon//2 tbsps plain yogurt (I used goat’s milk, but feel free to use greek or whatever you like)//3 agave nectar (squeezes)//salt (maldon)

ingredients: 4 kiwi (peeled)//2 cups frozen pineapple chunks//2 tbsps honey//1 cup ice

name: Skillet Salmon with Quinoa, Feta and Arugula

ingredients: 2 carrots (cut into 1-inch pieces)//1 celery ribs (cut into 1-inch pieces)//1 onion (small, peeled and halved)//1/2 lemon (thinly sliced)//coarse salt//4 salmon fillets (skinless, 6 ounces each and about 1 inch thick)

name: Salmon with Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: 3 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//24 ozs salmon fillets (wild, or substitute arctic char or striped bass)//3/4 tsp coarse salt//1/2 tsp black ground pepper (freshly)//4 garlic cloves (peeled and halved)//3 pts cherry tomatoes (multicolored)//1/2 cup fresh basil (thinly sliced)//2 shallots (thinly sliced)

name: Poached Salmon
ingredients: fine sea salt//ground white pepper//8 salmon fillets (3 ounces each, skinned, preferably organic or wild)

name: Salmon in a Bengali Mustard Sauce
ingredients: 3/4 lb salmon fillets (skinless)//1/4 tsp salt//1/4 tsp ground turmeric//1/4 tsp cayenne (powder)//1 tbsp ground mustard//1/2 tsp cayenne pepper (depending on how much spice you want)//1/4 tsp ground turmeric//1/4 tsp salt//2 tbsps mustard oil (or extra-virgin olive oil)//1/4 tsp mustard seeds (whole, brown or yellow)//1/4 tsp cumin seed (whole)//1/4 tsp fennel seeds (whole)//2 green chilies (slit slightly)

name: Lemon Rosemary Salmon
ingredients: 1 lemon (thinly sliced)//4 sprigs fresh rosemary//2 salmon fillets (bones and skin removed)//coarse salt (to taste)//1 tbsp olive oil (or as needed)

name: Thai Herbal Salmon Salad (Phla Pla Salmon)
ingredients: 11/2 lbs salmon fillets (cut into 1-inch cubes)//8 lime leaves (makrut)//4 stalks lemongrass//4 shallots (small, peeled ans sliced thinly lengthwise, about 1/2 cup)//4 jalapeno chilies (Thai bird's eye chilies, or 1 to 2, thinly sliced)//1/4 fish sauce (or more to taste)//4 tbsps juice (fresh, from about 3 limes)//1 cup mint leaves (loosely packed)

name: Garlic and Dill Salmon
ingredients: 3 lbs salmon fillets//1 head garlic (peeled)//1 oz fresh dill (chopped)//1/2 cup olive oil//1 tsp salt (and pepper to taste)

name: Toasted Sesame Ginger Salmon
ingredients: 11/2 lbs salmon//1/4 cup olive oil//2 tbsps toasted sesame oil//2 tbsps rice vinegar//2 tbsps brown sugar//2 tbsps soy sauce//2 garlic cloves (grated)//1 tbsp ginger (freshly grated)//2 tbsps toasted sesame seeds//4 green onions (sliced)//1/4 cup honey//1 tsp toasted sesame oil//1 tsp soy sauce//1/2 tsp ginger (freshly grated)//1/2 tsp toasted sesame seeds

name: Mustard-Crusted Salmon
ingredients: 11/3 lbs salmon fillets (center-cut)//11/2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//3 tbsps fresh dill (chopped, or 1-1/2 tablespoons dried dill)//11/2 tbsps herbes de provence//1/4 cup dijon mustard

name: Mediterranean Salmon
ingredients: 1/2 cup olive oil//1/4 cup balsamic vinegar//4 cloves garlic (pressed)//12 ozs salmon//1 tbsp chopped cilantro fresh//1 tbsp fresh basil (chopped)//11/2 tsps garlic salt

name: Salmon Provencal
ingredients: 3 plum tomatoes (large, coarsely chopped)//3 shallots (coarsely chopped)//1 tbsp fresh tarragon (chopped)//1 tbsp fresh basil (chopped)//1 tbsp chopped fresh chives//1 tbsp fresh lemon juice//1 tbsp balsamic vinegar//salt//2 tbsps olive oil//4 salmon fillets (about 5-6 ounces each)//black ground pepper (Freshly)

name: Salmon with Basil Sauce
ingredients: 24 ozs salmon fillets//olive oil//salt//black ground pepper//1 cup fresh basil//1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil//1 garlic cloves//2 tsps fresh lemon juice//1/4 tsp salt//1/4 tsp black ground pepper (freshly)

name: Salmon with Roasted Cauliflower
ingredients: 4 garlic cloves (chopped)//4 anchovy fillets//1/2 tsp red pepper flakes//pepper//salt//4 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//1 head cauliflower (core removed, cut into large florets)//4 salmon fillets (skinless, 4 to 6 ounces each)//2 lemon

name: Seared Salmon with Horseradish and Scallions
ingredients: 4 salmon fillets (6 ounces each, skin removed)//freshly ground pepper//coarse salt//1/4 cup prepared horseradish (drained)//2 tbsps extra-virgin olive oil//2 scallions (white and pale-green parts only, cut on the bias into 1/4-inch-thick slices)

name: Crispy Salmon with Steamed Bok Choy and Basil-Caper Relish

name: Miso-Glazed Salmon
ingredients: 1/4 cup brown sugar (packed)//2 tbsps low sodium soy sauce//2 tbsps hot water//2 tbsps miso (soybean paste)//24 ozs salmon fillets (about 1 inch thick)//cooking spray//1 tbsp chopped fresh chives

name: Warm Salmon and Arugula Pasta Salad
ingredients: 2 tsps lemon zest (grated)//1 tsp ground coriander//11/2 tsps kosher salt//2 tsps extra-virgin olive oil//2 cups grape tomatoes (halved)//1 shallots (small, peeled and thinly sliced lengthwise)//4 ozs goat cheese (mild, crumbled)//5 ozs baby arugula//3 tbsps olive oil//11/2 lbs salmon fillets//1 lb linguini (fini or other thin pasta)

name: Quick Broiled Ginger Salmon

name: Garlic Salmon
ingredients: 11/2 lbs salmon fillets//pepper//salt//3 cloves garlic (minced)//1 sprig fresh dill (chopped)//5 slices lemon//5 sprigs dill weed (fresh)//2 green onions (chopped)

name: Moroccan Salmon
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh parsley (chopped)//2 tsps olive oil//1 tsp fresh lemon juice//1/2 tsp salt//1/4 tsp ground ginger//1/4 tsp garlic powder//1/4 tsp ground red pepper//1/4 tsp ground cumin//1/4 tsp black ground pepper (freshly)//2 garlic cloves (minced)//24 ozs salmon fillets (about 1 inch thick)//cooking spray//1 lemon//11/2 cups red bell pepper (thinly sliced, about 1 medium)//11/2 cups green bell pepper (thinly sliced, about 1 medium)//2 tbsps water//1 plum tomatoes (large, cut crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick slices)

name: Maple-Miso Dijon Salmon
ingredients: 24 ozs salmon fillets//1/4 cup maple syrup//2 tbsps mustard (grainy)//1 tbsp dijon mustard//1 tbsp miso paste (white)//1 tbsp rice vinegar//2 tsps soy sauce//1 clove garlic (grated)

name: Lomi Lomi Salmon

name: Roasted Salmon with Zucchini, Lemon, and Dill
ingredients: 11/2 lbs zucchini (about 3 medium, cut diagonally into 1-inch-thick pieces)//2 lemon (quartered, seeds removed)//8 sprigs fresh dill//2 tbsps olive oil//coarse salt//ground pepper//32 ozs salmon fillets (each skinless)

name: Salmon with Dill Sauce
ingredients: 1 lb salmon fillets//11/2 tsps dill weed (divided)//1/2 cup plain yogurt//1/2 tsp sugar//1/2 tsp seasoning (blend)

name: Grilled Wild Salmon with Preserved Lemon Relish
ingredients: 1 lb salmon (a wild-caught, gutted, cleaned, skin on, scales removed)//olive oil//lemon juice (Fresh squeezed)//2 whole preserved lemon (rinsed of excess salt, seeds removed, chopped)//1/4 cup fresh parsley (chopped)//1/4 cup fresh dill (chopped)//1/4 cup shallots (chopped)//1 tsp olive oil//1/2 tsp lemon juice//black ground pepper

name: Smoked Salmon & Goat Cheese
ingredients: 4 ozs goat cheese//1/2 tsp cayenne pepper//1 lime//6 ozs smoked salmon (12 pieces, thinly sliced)//1/2 oz salmon caviar//12 chives (snipped finely)

name: Citrus Salmon in Parchment
ingredients: 16 ozs salmon fillets (wild)//3 tsps olive oil//1 blood orange (sliced into rounds)//1 lemon (sliced into rounds)//1 lime (sliced into rounds)//1 bunch dill weed (fresh)//1/2 tsp lemon pepper

name: Salmon Roasted in Cilantro Salsa
ingredients: 1 poblano peppers//1/3 cup fresh lime juice//2 green onions (sliced)//1 cup cilantro leaves (packed fresh, chopped)//1 tsp safflower oil (or sunflower)//1/2 tsp sea salt//18 ozs salmon fillets (skinned)

name: Balsamic Orange Salmon
ingredients: 1 tsp grate orang peel//1 tsp balsamic vinegar//1 tsp honey//1/4 tsp salt//2 salmon fillets (6 to 8 ounces each, skin removed)//3 tbsps orange juice//1 tbsp balsamic vinegar//1/2 tsp honey//1 pinch salt//green onions sliced//orange

name: Crunchy Wasabi Salmon with Lime

name: Honey-Mustard Salmon
ingredients: 2 tbsps dijon mustard//1 tbsp honey//1 tsp white wine vinegar//1/4 tsp kosher salt//1/4 tsp black ground pepper (freshly)//24 ozs salmon fillets (skinless)

name: Ginger-Crusted Salmon
ingredients: 11/2 cups fresh ginger (peeled and thinly sliced)//1 cup honey//kosher salt//16 ozs salmon steaks (or fillets)//black pepper (freshly ground)

name: Salmon with Roasted Tomatoes and Onions

name: Pan Seared Salmon with Avocado Remoulade

name: Curried Tuna Tartare

name: Sesame Tuna

name: Tuna Poke

name: Summertime Tuna Salad

name: Not-Your-Mama’s Tuna Salad

name: Tuna and Avocado-Stuffed Tomatoes
ingredients: 6 ozs light tuna (chunk)//1 avocado (small, cubed)//1/4 tsp pepper//1 tbsp fresh dill (chopped)//1 lemon (medium)//2 tomatoes (medium)

name: Orange Roughy Bundles

name: Sablefish with Sun-dried Tomato Tapenade

name: Black Cod with Lemon & Thyme Bread Crumbs

name: Quinoa-Crusted Fish with Plum Chutney

name: Grilled Black Cod with Fried Garlic and Chiles

name: Sauteed Black Cod with Shallot-Lemon Vinaigrette and Fresh Herb Salad
ingredients: 6 tbsps olive oil//1/3 cup shallots (minced)//2 tbsps fresh lemon juice//1 tbsp sherry wine vinegar//2 tsps grate lemon peel (packed)//salt//pepper//6 cups herbs (assorted fresh, leaves, such as Italian parsley, basil, and dill and edible flowers)//7 ozs black cod fillets (with skin)//1 tbsp olive oil

name: Hoisin-Glazed Black Cod with Bok Choy

name: Black Cod with Olives and Potatoes in Parchment

name: Smoked-Sable Tartare with Beets and Watercress

name: Mahi + Mango Salsa

name: Caribbean Mahimahi with Banana Chutney

name: Mahi-Mahi with Fresh Cilantro & Kiwi Chutney
ingredients: 1 cup chopped cilantro fresh (packed)//1 kiwi (large, peeled, cubed)//1/4 cup unsweetened coconut milk (canned)//1 large garlic cloves (peeled)//2 tsps chiles (chopped jalapeño)//7 ozs mahi mahi fillets//ground cumin//1 tbsp extra-virgin olive oil

name: Grilled Mahimahi with Tamarind Glaze
ingredients: 1/2 cup tamarind pulp (from a pliable block)//1 cup hot water (boiling-)//3 tbsps dark brown sugar (or packed palm)//2 tbsps soy sauce//2 tbsps asian fish sauce//1 tbsp fresh lime juice//1 mahimahi fillet (0, 1- to 1 1/2-inch-thick pieces, with skin, 6 oz each)//2 tbsps vegetable oil//1 tsp kosher salt

name: Citrus Fish with Bell Pepper Couscous

name: Grilled Mahi Mahi w/ Olive & Shallot Tapenade

name: Mahimahi with Asparagus and Cashews
